tuv.seg: $(DERS_BOLUMU $(IX user defined attributes) $(IX UDA) User Defined Attributes (UDA))
$(DERS_BOLUMU $(IX user defined attributes) $(IX UDA) 自定义属性（UDA）)
$(P Any declaration (e.g. struct type, class type, variable, etc.) can be assigned attributes, which can then be accessed at compile time to alter the way the code is compiled.
$(P 所有声明（如结构、类和变量等）都可以加上属性，以便在编译时访问这些属性来调整该部分代码的编译方式。
